title._content: Image taken from page 6 of 'The Children of the Mist; or, the Scottish clansmen in peace and war. Notes, etc. [With a plate.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Children of the Mist; or, the Scottish clansmen in peace and war. Notes, etc. [With a plate.]" Author: CAMPBELL, Archibald - Lord Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.h.25." Page: 6 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: W. & A. K. Johnston Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000584355 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
